citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
Rabbits L6434 and PO392 had urine soaked matts on their tails and perineal regions, impeding normal
urination/defecation, and risking dermatitis and infection, and rabbit Q9790 had active bilateral tearing from the eyes, with
hair loss and redness of the soft tissues surrounding the eyes. These health concerns are of longer than a days' duration,
and had not been observed by the facility. The facility must ensure that all health concerns are observed and reported to
the attending veterinarian for guidance in a timely fashion.
Correct by August 03, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives. This was a focused inspection for this
non compliance only. Any other findings will be documented on a subsequent routine inspection.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(3)  Direct
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
Rabbits L6434 and PO392 had urine soaked matts on their tails and perineal regions, impeding normal 
urination/defecation, and risking dermatitis and infection, and rabbit Q9790 had active bilateral tearing from the eyes, with 
hair loss and redness of the soft tissues surrounding the eyes. These health concerns are of longer than a days' duration, 
and had not been observed by the facility. The facility must ensure that all health concerns are observed and reported to 
the attending veterinarian for guidance in a timely fashion. 
 
Correct by August 03, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives. This was a focused inspection for this 
non compliance only. Any other findings will be documented on a subsequent routine inspection. 
 
 n
